title: Villager_Dialog
body:
Can I help you?
[[No, sorry for bothering...|exit]]
[[Yeah! What can I buy here?|op2]]

title: op2
body:
You can buy a lot. What are you looking for?
[[Tools.|tools]]
[[Items.|items]]
[[Nevermind.|exit]]

title: tools
body:
Ah, well i have much to choose from! Have a look!
[[Iron Sword - 1 Diamond|ironsword]]
[[Iron Pickaxe - 2 Diamonds|ironpickaxe]]
[[Iron Axe - 1 Diamond|ironaxe]]
[[Iron Shovel - 1 Diamond|ironshovel]]
[[Nevermind|exit]]

title: items
body:
What kind of item are you looking for?
[[Food.|food]]
[[Potions.|pots]]
[[Nevermind.|exit]]

title: ironsword
body: Here you go! Pleasure doing business with you!

title: ironpickaxe
body: Here you go! Pleasure doing business with you!

title: ironaxe
body: Here you go! Pleasure doing business with you!

title: ironshovel
body: Here you go! Pleasure doing business with you!

title: food
body:
Take a look at my wares.
[[20 Carrots - 1 Diamond|carrot]]
[[20 Potatoes - 1 Diamond|potat]]
[[5 Steak - 1 Diamond|beef]]
[[Nevermind.|exit]]

title: pots
body:
Looking for magically items ey? Take a look at my collection!
[[Healing Potion - 2 Diamonds]]
[[Strength Potion - 3 Diamonds]]
[[Nevermind|exit]]

title: carrot

body: Oh, have a good day then.
